name: Please, Touch The Artwork
description:
Please, Touch The Artwork is a game that explores the question:
What would happen if you did touch the artwork?
Visit the exhibition of T. Waterzooi, a proclaimed artist from the old days, who accidentally revealed the secrets of some of the world’s most famous abstract paintings.
Play/experience these paintings which range from color-puzzles, to narrative-adventures, memory-trials and creating your own art.
Browse the galleries to learn more about the original artists and their ideas about art and society.
The title is a reference to the placards in museums telling you not to touch the art.
In this game you finally can!
Aesthetic elegant puzzles
Based on famous art-styles
Each puzzle based on a different art-style or painting
3 paintings with unique puzzle-like-gameplay per painting
Combines to over 100 levels
Procedurally generated levels for replayability and uniqueness.Accessible
Simple controls (one-finger tap/touch/click)
Fit for ages 9 - 99.
No previous gaming-experience or skills required.
Available on (almost) all mobile devicesRelaxing
No-stress puzzle-solving
Subtle brain-training
Jazzy-soundtrack that complements the art-style.Educational
Get to know the story behind the first modern artists.
Contains artist-quotes
Unlock parts of the story as you progress.
